plot: In an attempt to save the state of independent film three pretentious film geeks set out on a mission to self distribute their own independent movies.
title: Indie
plot_es: In an attempt to save the state of independent film three pretentious film geeks set out on a mission to self distribute their own independent movies.
plot_en: In an attempt to save the state of independent film three pretentious film geeks set out on a mission to self distribute their own independent movies.
